channel.title: Transfer Learning on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in Transfer Learning on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Noise May Contain Transferable Knowledge: Understanding Semi-supervised Heterogeneous Domain Adaptation from an Empirical Perspective
item.description: Unveiling the surprising potential of noise: transferable knowledge in semi-supervised heterogeneous domain adaptation (SHDA).

item.title: Towards Data-Efficient Pretraining for Atomic Property Prediction
item.description: High-quality, task-relevant pretraining data surpasses large-scale pretraining in atomic property prediction, achieving comparable performance at 1/24th the computational cost.
